title: Did the FDA Change Packaging Laws Because of the Blue Bell Ice Cream Licker?
subtitle: Such a move would have been an impossibly fast reaction by an agency whose rules must go through multiple levels of review and public comment before implementation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration is changing their regulations to require plastic seals in ice cream packaging in response to the “Blue Bell ice cream licker.”
